backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data types and state for files, notes, folders, missions, tasks, and authorization, including health/diagnostic queries and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three mission-related bug-fix requirements to affected frontend files and components with high-confidence validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file listing concise summaries for numerous frontend components, hooks, utils, and styling files describing their responsibilities and behaviors.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing a 1:1 baseline with Live version 114, detailing verification steps, parity guarantees, and change-control rules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes plus base styling.
frontend/index.html: Sets up the main HTML entry with PWA metadata, icons, and loads the React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Notice declaring a post-restore freeze prohibiting any code changes until explicit user approval, outlining allowed actions and change-control policy.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling minimal precaching, runtime caching, and network-first fetch logic.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming full restoration of frontend behavior to Live version 114, including authentication, initialization, UI, file management, styling, and utilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wrapper handling theming, providers, and conditional intro screen based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing error details and actions when actor initialization fails.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated gallery target icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed decorative bottom line separator.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening or download a file when blocked by the browser.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Provides a dialog to preview files of various types and includes actions like download, open in new tab, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles uploading files, creating links, and creating notes with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Renders a floating button that opens the folders view when clicked.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folders management dialog supporting folder creation, renaming, deletion, and selection.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen interface for browsing, selecting, and managing folders including create, rename, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen file viewer with swipe navigation and actions like download, delete, share, and folder assignment.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a gallery of files and notes with selection, long‑press actions, and viewers for images, videos, and notes.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with theme toggle, auth menu, and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a brief splash animation and fades out before continuing.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link can't open, offering retry or copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login button that initiates Internet Identity authentication and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission view with autosave, task management, and file/note attachments with viewers.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title input and task list management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens missions, with hover animations and disabled handling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list with selection, creation, swipe actions, and deletion handling using mission queries.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper layout that constrains children to a mobile-only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files or notes into a mission with mutation handling and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note with actions to download, share, send, or delete it.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes to folders or back to the main collection with performance diagnostics.
Component enabling left-swipe actions (edit/delete) with pointer gesture handling and open-state control.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a unified upload progress bar when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Renders an introductory screen with a target-themed SVG icon, descriptive text, and a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides a React context that initializes and manages a backend actor with retry, error handling, and admin token support.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Manages upload batches, progress updates, and completion using a React context with batched animation-frame updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Fetches and maintains a backend actor instance via react-query, recreating it when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once when the backend actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, stored identity loading, and authentication state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer such as touch and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Implements debounced autosaving for missions with change detection, mission switching resets, and queued saves during in‑flight updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions using a backend actor with cache management.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, retrieving, moving, and deleting notes, with cache invalidation for related note lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Supplies React Query hooks for files and folders, including fetching by folder/mission and creating folders with concurrency‑limited uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, including color schemes for notes and missions.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage component handling authentication, data prefetching, folder/mission views, and optional dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Utilities for classifying actor initialization errors and producing standardized user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides helpers for opening URLs, downloading files or notes, and sharing via Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Defines rules for how files should open based on MIME type, determining viewer, download, or office preview behavior.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes MIME types and provides helpers for determining previewability and generating human-readable file labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares two task arrays safely with BigInt support to determine equality.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Lightweight opt-in timing utility for logging performance metrics and wrapping async operations.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Tools for inspecting React Query cache state and logging mission delete lifecycle events for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Implements a smoke test that exercises folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and list verification using backend APIs.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Provides a simple concurrency limiter class to control the number of parallel promise executions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and loading required plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files defining the Live v114 baseline used for parity verification and drift detection.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, architectural notes, and known issues, including the mission task toggle bug to be fixed.
